鯷字的基本解释

鯷
tí
见“鳀”。

鯷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
［《廣韻》是義切，去寘，禪。］
“鳀1”的繁体字。
(1)大鲇。
(2)鱼纲鯷科。又名黑背鳁。体长三寸到四寸，侧扁，银灰色，体侧有一显明银白色纵带，无侧线。腹部呈圆柱形，眼和口都大。为群集于浅海的小型鱼类。我国东海、黄海盛产。幼鯷多加工制成鱼干，通称海蜒。
(3)我国古代东方海中种族名。

鯷字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯷； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1473第29
【唐韻】杜奚切【集韻】田黎切【正韻】杜兮切，?音題。同鮷。【博雅】鮎也。【類篇】魚重千斤。【戰國策】鯷冠秫縫。【註】鯷，大鮎，以其皮爲冠。又【前漢·地理志】會稽海外有東鯷人。又【廣韻】【集韻】?是義切，音䜴。又【廣韻】特計切【集韻】大計切，?音弟。又【集韻】上紙切，音是。義?同。

See "Anchovy".
Ankle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
["Guangyun" special plan to cut, go to Ji, set. ]
["Guangyun" is righteous cut, go to place, Zen. ]
"鳀1" in traditional characters.
(1) The big catfish.
(2) Fish Class Anchovy. Also known as the black-backed snakehead. The body is three to four inches long, flat side, silver-gray, with a prominent silver-white longitudinal band on the side of the body, without lateral lines. The abdomen is cylindrical, with large eyes and mouth. It is a small fish that gathers in shallow seas. The East my country Sea and the Yellow Sea are abundant in China. Young anchovies are mostly processed into dried fish, commonly known as sea serpents.
(3) The names of races in the ancient eastern sea of our country.
Ankle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鯷; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1473 29
[Tang Yun] Du Xiqie [Jiyun] Tian Liqie [Zheng Yun] Du Xiqie,? Sound title. The same siblings. [Bo Ya] Ayuya. 【Classes】Fish weighs a thousand catties. [Warring States Policy] Anchovy crown and seam. 【Note】Anchovy, big catfish, is crowned by its skin. Also [Former Han Geography] There are Dongan people overseas in Kuaiji. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's Yiqie, Yinqi. Also [Guangyun] Special plan [Jiyun] Grand plan,? Yindi. [Jiyun] cut on paper again, the sound is yes. Righteous? Same.
